text:
Sport What time and channel is Liverpool vs Everton on? TV information and more ahead of the Merseyside derby Jurgen Klopp's side took all three points when the two sides met in December - Sadio Mane scored in the 90th minute of a tense affair at Goodison Park Share Liverpool host Everton this weekend (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe 
Liverpool host Everton this weekend in the season's final Merseyside derby. 
Jurgen Klopp's side took all three points when the two sides met in December - Sadio Mane scored in the 90th minute of a tense affair at Goodison Park. 
The two sides come in to the game just six points apart in the league, and Ronald Koeman will not have given up hope of catching his neighbours. Depending on Arsenal and Manchester United's results, a win could take Everton as high as fourth this weekend. 
But what time is the game? And how can you watch it. Here is all you need to know... Sadio Mane scores an injury-time winner in December's Merseyside derby (Photo: Getty Images Europe) When is the game? 
The Merseyside derby kicks off at 12.30pm on Saturday, April 1. How can you watch it? 
The match will be broadcast live on Sky Sports 1 and Sky Sports 1 HD. 
If you cannot get to a television on time, you can also follow all of the action on the MirrorFootball blog. Seamus Coleman had his leg broken during the international break (Photo: AFP) Team news 
Liverpool: Daniel Sturridge (hip) and Jordan Henderson (bruised foot) are both doubts for Saturday's game. Ovie Ejaria (ankle) is also expected to be out. Adam Bogdan (ACL) and Danny Ings (knee) are not expected back until next season. 
Everton: The Toffees will be without Seamus Coleman, whose leg was broken on international duty. He is not expected back until 2018. Yannick Bolasie (ACL) is also out for the season while Mo Besic (ACL) should finally return to action at the end of next month. Morgan Schneiderlin (calf) could return in time but it looks unlikely that James McCarthy (hamstring) will be available. Like us on Facebook
